name: Melt Their Hearts
description:
You take an adventure across the frozen Kamchatka Tundra to attempt to discover the Legendary Ice Maidens, A large being that can't feel the cold.

Made this VN after helping to create an OC for a friend and got inspired to create a VN around the characters species.
